data.title: Austin Film Society
data.meta_description: Founded in 1985 by Richard Linklater, the Austin Film Society’s mission is to empower our community to make, watch, and love film and creative media.
data.text:
Essential Cinema

World Animation: To the Stars and Beyond

Aug 6-Aug 31

From modern critical darlings to legendary juggernauts, AFS takes a look at some of the greatest animated sci-fi worlds ever created.

Buy Tickets

PAN AFRICAN FILM FESTIVAL

August 15-18

AFS welcomes Los Angeles’ famed Black film and arts festival for a second annual Austin series. Featuring acclaimed features, shorts, and special guests in attendance.

Buy Tickets & Passes

2024 AFS Grant for Short Films

Deadline: September 12

The submission window for the AFS Grant for Short Films is now open. Apply by Sep. 12 for the opportunity to receive up to 10K in funding.

Apply

AFS Viewfindersour film culture site

At the Table of Hong Sang-soo

Written by Diane Killough, AFS Creative Careers Intern Across Hong Sang-Soo’s body of work, tables serve as a focal point for interactions between his characters. For the average Hong Sang-soo protagonist, life is typically complicated, frequently made messier by their own actions. Days are often filled with fumbled social encounters and misunderstandings, and an underlying […]

The AFS Guide to SXSW 2024

SXSW is a magical time of the year where, for a few weeks in March, the world turns its eyes on Austin, and the entire city transforms to exhibit the freshest work across creative disciplines and host countless artists, industry titans, fans, and supporters. For us, it’s all about the films and the Texas filmmakers […]
